newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Otra says Q1 sales flat.
newsitem.headline: Otra says Q1 sales flat.

text.p: Technical wholesaler Otra said on Thursday sales in the first quarter of 1997 were broadly equal to those in the same period of 1996.
"Corrected to the number of working days, sales per day increased by more than four percent," the company said in a brief statement, giving no actual figures.
The company added it was maintaining a previous forecast that operating income would improve this year.
Otra in February announced a slump in 1996 net profit to 28.7 million guilders from 92.4 million, on turnover of 3.87 billion guilders, up from 3.83 billion a year earlier.
In a statement released in April Otra said: "Management expects profit from ordinary operations to improve this year. The first two months of the new financial year confirm this expectation."
Otra said it expected to announce half year figures on August 29.
